public class AddressService
extends java.lang.Object

init

public static void init(CryptoSMSMidlet midlet)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Inits the singleton AdressService. All Recordstores are opened or created. The intialised field gui is used for showing Exceptions in the User Interface

Parameters:
gui - the main class of the user interface
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - for RecordStores
